additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter additional remarks about the specimen (set) in this state.

age._instruction: Add the age of the specimen (set) in this state.

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this specimen (set) state that may help you to more easily find it again.

pathology._instruction: Add the pathology of the specimen (set) in this state.

relativeTimeIndication._instruction: If there is a temporal relation, add the relative time that has passed between this and the previous specimen state referenced under 'descended from'.

weight._instruction: Add the weight of the specimen (set) in this state.
